title: Fallen University: Year Three
description: It’s about so much more than the bond now.Gavriel has taken one of the men I love, and he’s about to learn an important lesson.Never piss off a succubus.This is the final book in the Fallen University trilogy, a reverse harem romance with a slightly snarky heroine and four sexy, supernatural men. It includes cursing and lots of steam and is intended for readers 18+
author: Callie Rose
